reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate for umbrella term 'Thyroid Diseases' summing major subcategories: hypothyroidism (~4500 per 100k prevalence), hyperthyroidism (~1500 per 100k), thyroid cancer (~3 per 100k incidence), and thyroiditis (~100 per 100k). Reported as prevalence since most thyroid conditions are chronic with unclear incidence. Significant overlap between categories reduces confidence.
